price: Woi nom nyinaa yε bͻne na εyε akyiwadeε wͻ wo Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ.
arabic: كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّكَ مَكۡرُوهٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: kullu dhālika kāna sayyi-uhu ʿinda rabbika makrūhan
